Female directors, writers, and producers
Source: IMDB
name table: has gender
info table: runtime, genres
kind_type: movie=1
role_type: director=8, producer=3, 

join role_type with cast_info based on 

SELECT ci. person_id, ci. movie_id, ci. role_id
FROM cast_info ci
JOIN role_type rt
ON ci. role_id = rt .id
WHERE rt.id = 8
;
